thread.title: Finesse Solutions Incorporates In United Kingdom
thread.title_full: Finesse Solutions Incorporates In United Kingdom

author: admin
title: Finesse Solutions Incorporates In United Kingdom
text:
Finesse Solutions, Inc. 
SANTA CLARA, Calif., Oct. 26, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Finesse enhances presence in United Kingdom and rest of Europe. 
Finesse Solutions, Inc. has enhanced its business operations in the United Kingdom and Europe by forming a branch office in Leicester, UK. 
With a growing European market, Finesse is taking steps to increase its operational activities in the United Kingdom including software development and validation. The incorporation of Finesse Solutions UK will also help streamline commercial transactions in the UK and Europe, with the goal of shortening lead times and order handling. 
"As a global company, Finesse is continually searching for better ways to support all of our customers," stated Dr. Barbara Paldus, CEO of Finesse Solutions. "This new branch office will enable Finesse to provide a better customer experience for our UK and European customers." 
About Finesse Solutions, Inc. 
Finesse Solutions provides flexible hardware and software automation which allows for unmatched customizable bioprocessing. We are a research based, Silicon Valley company who believes in empowering our clients with innovative single-use sensors, bioreactors, controllers and software. Our SmartParts are the foundation of a Finesse solution using technologies from inside and outside of the biopharmaceutical industry. In addition to our own products, we are the only supplier with integration expertise offering clients the independence to select any preferred supplier of key unit operations from upstream to downstream. Whether it's a stand-alone, single-use bioreactor for research and development or a fully integrated Smartfactory in cGMP manufacturing, we have a bioprocess solution for our customers. 
For more information, please visit us at www.finesse.com . 
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/finesse-solutions-incorporates-in-united-kingdom-300165653.html 
SOURCE Finesse Solutions, Inc.
